mapper.sql: id, update_time AS updateTime, create_time AS createTime, version,ancestors_ordersn AS ancestorsOrdersn,parent_ordersn AS parentOrdersn, ordersn, channel_id AS channelId, channel_userid AS channelUserid, channel_ordersn AS channelOrdersn, biz_sign AS bizSign, provinder_id AS provinderId, chained,chained_content AS chainedContent,state,state_time AS stateTime, wallet_addr AS walletAddr, public_key AS publicKey, attest_sign AS attestSign, attest_type AS attestType, biz_type AS bizType, file_name AS fileName, file_type AS fileType, file_size AS fileSize, file_sign AS fileSign, file_hash AS fileHash, encrypted, encrypt_alog AS encryptAlog, encrypt_key AS encryptKey, owner_type AS ownerType, owner_id AS ownerId, owner_name AS ownerName, agent_name AS agentName, agent_phone AS agentPhone, agent_email AS agentEmail, origin_time AS originTime, start_time AS startTime,expired_time AS expiredTime,duration, description, price, request_time AS requestTime,platform_sign AS platformSign
mapper.select:
select
FROM attest_history ah WHERE ah.ordersn=#{ordersn} limit 1

select
FROM attest_history ah WHERE ah.channel_ordersn=#{channel_ordersn} limit 1
